column1: column_a

adrienne.mack@dal.frb.org
valerie.grossman@dal.frb.org
HPI series for Germany is constructed using annual data. The values for 2013Q1-2013Q3 represent the forecasted annual value that has been interpolated to a quarterly frequency.
HPI series for Italy is constructed using semi-annual data. The value for 2013Q3 represent the forecasted semi-annual value that has been interpolated to a quarterly frequency.
HPI series for Netherlands contains backcasted values for 1975Q1-1975Q4.
HPI series for New Zealand contains a forecasted value for 2013Q3.
The HPI series for Ireland was changed to incorporate the National Statistics' hedonic price index, which better reflects underlying movements in house prices.
PDI series for Belgium contains forecasted values for 2013Q2 and 2013Q3.
PDI series for Germany incorporates forecasted values for the change in net equity of households in 2013Q1-2013Q3.
PDI series for Denmark contains a forecasted value for 2013Q3.
PDI series for Spain contains a forecasted value for 2013Q3.
PDI series for Finland contains a forecasted value for 2013Q3.
PDI series for France incorporates a forecasted value for the consumption of fixed capital value in 2013Q3.
PDI series for Ireland contains a forecasted value for 2013Q3.
PDI series for Italy contains a forecasted value for 2013Q3.
PDI series for Netherlands contains a forecasted value for 2013Q3.
PDI series for Sweden contains a forecasted value for 2013Q3.
PDI series for Switzerland is constructed using annual data. Values for 2012 & 2013 represent annual forecasts that have been interpolated to a quarterly frequency.

PDI series for U.K. is constructed using annual consumption of fixed capital data. The values for 2013Q1 - 2013Q3 incorporate the forecasted annual value for consumption of fixed capital that has been interpolated to a quarterly frequency.
PDI series for Japan contains forecasted values for 2013Q2 and 2013Q3.
PDI series for S. Korea is constructed using annual data. The values for 2013Q1 - 2013Q3 represent an annual forecast that has been interpolated to a quarterly frequency.

PDI series for Luxembourg is only available from 2006-2012. The remaining observations have been inferred partly with Belgian data. The series is constructed using annual data. The values for 2013 represent annual forecasts that have been interpolated to a quarterly frequency.
PDI series for Norway contains a forecasted value for 2013Q3.
PDI series for Croatia is constructed using annual data. Values for 2012 & 2013 represent annual forecasts that have been interpolated to a quarterly frequency.
Forecasts used in HPI and PDI series are also used in their corresponding real counterparts (RHPI and RPDI).
